web_snippets: Missy Purcell. Former teacher. Missy Purcell is a former teacher, a wife and mother to 3 boys and a fur baby. She is a convert from balanced literacy and now ...
Missy Purcell is a teacher. She used balanced literacy methods in her classroom for many years. Then her son went to kindergarten. He didn't learn to read ...
An educator for almost a decade and a mother of three boys, Missy Purcell became a determined advocate for dyslexia awareness and remediation six years ago.
